system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MjNoL6QtM0Nptxsw]{Rifle Specialist}

Benefits

When targeting an adjacent opponent with an assault,
battle, or target rifle the character takes no ranged attack penalties,
and when using a carbine as a melee weapon the Combat Point
cost is reduced by 1

Normal

When using an assault, battle, or target rifle against an
adjacent opponent, the character takes a -6 penalty on all ranged
attacks.
system.summary: No close combat penalties with rifles, -1 CP to melee with carbines
